edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.environment

Class HSEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.environment.HSEnvironment

  • public class HSEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    The environment that contains all of the components and provides functionality for configuring/executing simulations. It organizes all of the components that are relevant, keeping them separate from the system components. It interacts with the user and the engine to perform tasks with minimal user effort. Each environment is linked to an engine, which it uses to perform these tasks and simulations. Intended Operator: User

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected EnvironmentSettings settings
      The current environment settings.
      protected SystemSet systems
      The set of all hybrid systems included in the environment.
      protected TrajectorySet trajectories
      The set of trajectories that are stored during a simulation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HSEnvironment()
      Creates a new empty hybrid systems environment with the default settings.
